name: div
features: Fabric Construction : Double Knit – Lightweight & durable for long-lasting performance
Waistband Design : Tunnel-belt loop waist for a secure, adjustable fit
Closure : Fly front with extended two-snap closure for easy wear
Back Pockets : Set-in with button closure for secure storage
Knee Protection : Double Knee – Dual-layer construction for enhanced durability & protection
Branding : Embroidered logo for a professional look
Moisture Management : DRYLITE – Dual filament yarn wicks moisture to maintain a cool, dry microclimate
